LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JsonLd.Admin.Settings.Enable.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether the plugin is enabled.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JsonLd.Admin.Settings.Name.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the seller name in the JSON-LD structured data.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JsonLd.Admin.Settings.Description.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the default page description in the JSON-LD structured data.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JsonLd.Admin.Settings.PictureId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the image in the JSON-LD structured data.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JsonLd.Admin.Settings.AdditionalPages.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the additional pages that are linked to your store in the JSON-LD structured data. This is the "sameAs" field. You can enter multiple URLs separated by "," here.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JsonLd.Admin.Settings.StreetAddress.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the street address in the JSON-LD structured data. Leave blank if there is no address.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JsonLd.Admin.Settings.AddressLocality.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the address locality in the JSON-LD structured data. Leave blank if there is no address locality.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JsonLd.Admin.Settings.PostalCode.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the postal code in the JSON-LD structured data. Leave blank if there is no postal code.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JsonLd.Admin.Settings.Country.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the address country in the JSON-LD structured data. Leave blank if there is no address country.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.JsonLd.Admin.Settings.Phone.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the address telephone in the JSON-LD structured data. Leave blank if there is no address telephone.
